full_description: Move blocks from pads {A} and {B} to the empty pad {C} in a sequential cycle.
schema: {A} notifies pad 0, {B} notifies pad 1, {C} notifies pad 2, {a} notifies the left arm, {b} notifies the right arm
preference: No adjectives at the end. Max 15 words. Include {A}, {B}, {C} in all. Include {a} or {b} in exactly 50% of instructions.
seen: Use {a} and {b} to cycle blocks from {A} and {B} via {C}.
